title: Customer Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a customer can register successfully by providing valid name, phone number, password, and device name.

steps.description: Send registration API request with valid name, phone number, password, and device name.
Verify the response status code is 201 Created.
Verify the response body contains customer ID and authentication token.

title: Customer Registration with Missing Fields
description: Verify that registration fails when required fields are missing in the customer registration request.

steps.description: Send registration API request omitting required fields such as name or phone number.
Verify the response status code is 400 Bad Request or appropriate validation error.
Verify the response body includes error details about missing fields.

title: Customer Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify successful customer login with valid phone number and password, receiving a Sanctum token.

steps.description: Send login API request with correct phone number and password.
Verify the response status code is 200 OK.
Verify the response body contains a valid Sanctum token.

title: Customer Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid phone number or password.

steps.description: Send login API request with incorrect phone number or password.
Verify the response status code is 401 Unauthorized.
Verify the response body contains an authentication failure message.

title: Seller Registration with Complete Store Details
description: Verify seller can register successfully providing store details, owner info, location, and credentials.

steps.description: Send seller registration API request with valid store name, owner info, location, and credentials.
Verify the response status code is 201 Created.
Verify the response includes seller/store identifier and authentication token.

title: Seller Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify seller login is successful using store credentials and returns authentication token.

steps.description: Send seller login API request with correct store credentials.
Verify response status is 200 OK.
Verify response includes a Sanctum token.

title: Public API Vehicle List Retrieval
description: Verify public API endpoint returns an accurate list of vehicles with 200 status and expected structure.

steps.description: Send a GET request to the public vehicles endpoint.
Verify the response status is 200 OK.
Verify the response contains a complete list of vehicles with relevant fields.

title: Public API Categories and Subcategories Retrieval
description: Verify categories and subcategories API returns full and accurate lists with 200 status.

steps.description: Send GET requests to categories and subcategories public API endpoints.
Verify response code is 200 OK for each endpoint.
Verify response data includes expected categories and subcategories details.

title: Marketplace Search by Vehicle Make and Model
description: Verify that searching parts filtered by vehicle make and model returns relevant parts data.

steps.description: Send a marketplace search API request with valid vehicle make and model parameters.
Verify the response status is 200 OK.
Verify the returned parts list is relevant to the vehicle make and model.

title: Marketplace Search with Invalid Vehicle Parameters
description: Verify search API returns appropriate empty results or error when vehicle make or model is invalid or missing.

steps.description: Send marketplace search API request with invalid or no vehicle parameters.
Verify the response status is 200 OK with empty results, or an error with suitable status code.

title: Authenticated Customer Logout and Token Invalidation
description: Verify that an authenticated customer can log out and the Sanctum token is invalidated.

steps.description: Log in as a customer to obtain authentication token.
Send logout API request with valid authorization token.
Verify response status is 200 OK confirming logout.
Attempt to access a protected endpoint with the same token.
Verify access is denied (401 Unauthorized) after logout.

title: Authenticated Seller Logout and Token Invalidation
description: Verify that an authenticated seller can log out and their Sanctum token is invalidated properly.

steps.description: Log in as seller to obtain Sanctum token.
Send logout API request using seller's authentication token.
Verify response status code is 200 OK.
Attempt to access protected seller endpoints with invalidated token.
Ensure response status is 401 Unauthorized.

title: Mobile App Navigation Flow Testing
description: Verify user can navigate seamlessly between Authentication, Home, Search Results, Part Details, and Favorites screens without errors.

steps.description: Launch the app and navigate to login screen.
Perform successful login to proceed to Home Screen.
From Home Screen, navigate to Search Results screen using search functionality.
Select a part from search results to open Part Details screen.
From Part Details, add part to favorites and navigate to Favorites screen.
Navigate back to Home and then to Profile/Logout screen.
Verify no navigation errors occur and UI renders as expected during all transitions.

title: Favorites Management Functionality
description: Verify users can add parts to favorites, view the list on Favorites screen, and remove parts successfully.

steps.description: Login as a customer and navigate to Part Details screen of a specific part.
Add the part to favorites.
Verify part is displayed in the Favorites screen.
Remove the part from favorites.
Verify the part no longer appears in the Favorites list.

title: API Service Request Handling with Axios
description: Verify that the API service layer handles requests correctly, including request headers, response parsing, and error handling.

steps.description: Invoke various API calls through the client API service, covering authentication, search, and data retrieval.
Validate that requests include required headers such as authorization.
Confirm responses are parsed correctly and errors are handled gracefully with appropriate results or exceptions.

title: Backend Setup and Database Seeding Verification
description: Verify backend Laravel 11 server starts correctly as per README instructions and database is seeded with initial data.

steps.description: Follow backend setup instructions to start Laravel server.
Verify server is running without errors.
Check database tables for seeded data such as vehicles, categories, and parts.
Confirm expected seed data presence for application functionality.
